thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 12 of 150
thread.title: Warren

author: Warren
title: Warren
text:
Wrong item shipped, then the representative tells me the item that was ordered is not available and won't be in the future. Went back to store, a 35 mile trip each way. Will Call counter where I picked it up tells me to go to customer service. Customer service tells me I have to go to Will Call. They finally took the item in return, but then tell me I have to go back to Customer Service because their machine is broken and they cannot credit my card. Back to Customer Service and stand in line for the single agent to issue the credit.
Two round trips, 140 miles and 10 gallons of fuel.
All this was enough to convince me never to deal with this merchant again.
